site.name: Darjeeling Heights
site.description: A sanctuary perched among the clouds, where every moment is touched by mountain magic
site.longDescription: Nestled in the heart of the Himalayas, our luxury hotel offers an unparalleled escape into natural beauty and refined elegance. Each space has been thoughtfully designed to frame the majestic landscapes while providing intimate comfort and world-class service.

carousel.title: Panoramic vistas of Kanchenjunga
carousel.description: Wake up to breathtaking views of the third highest peak in the world, framed perfectly from every window

carousel.title: Surrounded by lush tea estates
carousel.description: Immerse yourself in the heritage of Darjeeling's finest tea plantations, just steps from your room

carousel.title: Colonial charm meets modern comfort
carousel.description: Experience the elegance of restored colonial architecture with contemporary luxury amenities

carousel.title: Rejuvenate mind and body
carousel.description: Indulge in authentic Himalayan spa treatments and wellness experiences in serene mountain settings

items.name: Kanchenjunga Suite
items.description: Panoramic views of the world's third highest peak from floor-to-ceiling windows. Features a private balcony, king-sized bed, and luxury marble bathroom.

items.name: Heritage Garden Suite
items.description: Overlooking lush tea plantations with colonial-inspired interiors. Spacious seating area, antique furnishings, and a clawfoot bathtub with garden views.

items.name: Himalayan Sky Suite
items.description: Our crown jewel with 360-degree mountain views. Two-level penthouse with private rooftop terrace, fireplace, and exclusive butler service.

items.name: Misty Valley Room
items.description: Cozy and intimate with valley views through traditional bay windows. Perfect blend of modern amenities and mountain charm with warm wooden interiors.

features.title: Exquisite Suites
features.description: Rooms designed with warmth and elegance

features.title: Wellness Sanctuary
features.description: Spa and meditation spaces for complete relaxation

features.title: Private Terraces
features.description: Your personal viewing deck to the Himalayas

features.title: Timeless Design
features.description: Warm woods, natural stone, and mountain-inspired interiors

experiences.title: Curated Experiences
experiences.subtitle: Discover the essence of Darjeeling through bespoke activities

items.title: Darjeeling Tea Masterclass
items.description: Embark on a journey through the world-renowned tea estates of Darjeeling. Learn the art of tea tasting from expert sommeliers, walk through emerald plantations, and enjoy a private tasting session featuring the finest First Flush varieties.

location.title: In the Heart of Darjeeling
location.description1: Perched at 7,000 feet above sea level, our hotel offers unparalleled access to Darjeeling's most iconic experiences and stunning natural beauty.
location.description2: Rich in colonial history and Himalayan culture, Darjeeling captivates with its misty mornings, world-famous tea gardens, and the legendary toy train that winds through the mountains.

newsletter.title: Stay Connected
newsletter.description: Unlock exclusive offers and mountain stories delivered to your inbox.
